description:
PKGN1 is a compilation package of multiple programs written in North Star BASIC. The games are:

  • Roadrace
  • 3D Tictac
  • Evenwins
  • Suprwump
  • Biorhythm (not a game)
title: PKGN1

description: Tanforan is a horse race betting game. There are seven horses with statistics for each and their jockeys. Odds change after each race and up to four players can place bets.
title: Tanforan

description: Five-Card-Stud is a poker game using Nevada-rules Five-card-stud. The player must bet on their cards based on their value and the perceived value of the cards of the opponents. The game uses high stakes.
title: Five-Card-Stud

description: Three-Card-Draw is a poker game using the three-card-draw rules.
title: Three-Card-Draw

description: Blackjack is a computer version of the casino card game. Up to four players play against the bank. Each round the players try to get to a card value of 21 or as close as possible without going over.
title: Blackjack

description: Ttaktoe is a simple Tic-Tac-Toe game. The player plays against the computer and they take turns putting their mark in a 3x3 grid. Whoever gets three in a row first wins. The player can't actually win because the computer plays a perfect game so the best that can be achieved is a draw.
title: Ttaktoe

description: Tiktak is a Tic-Tac-Toe game. The player plays against the computer and both take turns putting their mark in a 3x3 grid. Whoever manages to get three in a row wins the game. The AI is flawed allowing the player to win. The game keeps score over multiple plays.
title: Tiktak

description: Gunner is a textual artillery game. The player must hit a number of targets in as few shots as possible. The player fires by giving an elevation in degrees. Shots that land within 25 meters of a target are a hit. Before each shot the player will be shot at, creating a chance of the player getting destroyed.
title: Gunner

description: Draw Poker Simulator is a poker game using rules as played in the casinos of Gardenia, CA. The deck includes a joker card and the game is played against six other computer-controlled players.
title: Draw Poker Simulator

description: Chess Scramble is a variant of Chess using similar rules but adding random elements similar to those found in Backgammon. The game allows two players to play against each other.
title: Chess Scramble

description: Vega is a chess program written in Z80 assembly. It managed to reach second place in the second PCW Microcomputer Chess Championship in 1979.
title: Vega

description: Basketball Micro-Style is a text-based basketball management game. A fantasy competition can be built by choosing which teams participate. Players coach their team by arranging the lineups before each match. The match itself is then played automatically. The game consists of a set of programs required for creating and adjusting the data for each team with its players.
title: Basketball Micro-Style

description: Micro Monopoly is an unofficial computer implementation of the classic board game. Players start with $1500 which they can invest in properties. Players roll the dice to move around the board and land on properties, which when available can be bought. When landing on a property owned by another player rent must be paid. Owned properties can be developed with houses. Other features of the board game such as Chance and Community Chest cards are also available.
title: Micro Monopoly

description: Starship Troopers is a computer implementation of the tabletop wargame of the same name. The game, in turn based on the novel by Robert A. Heinlein plays out battles between the human race and aliens (Skinnies) who employ arachnid aliens as their combat forces.
title: Starship Troopers

description: Invasion of the Mud People is a wargame about a battle between the Peruvian army and fictive mud people that are emerging from the ground in a remote village.
title: Invasion of the Mud People

description: Panzer is a wargame simulating a clash between Soviet and German forces in Ukraine on November 23rd 1943.
title: Panzer

description: Blitzkrieg is a wargame simulating battles in Spring 1940 in northern France where German and French forces clash en-route to Paris in the European theater of World War II. The game is based on an existing tabletop wargame.
title: Blitzkrieg

description: Fall of the Third Reich is a wargame taking place in March 1945 at the end of World War II. Two players fight each other with one controlling the Americans heading for Berlin and the other the Germans. The game is based on a tabletop wargame.
title: Fall of the Third Reich

description: Armorcar is a wargame taking place during World War II on the European east front. The date is February 2nd, 1944. One player controls the Germans whose goal is to get an armored convoy with supplies to the front. The other player plays Russian partisans. The game is based on an existing tabletop wargame.
title: Armorcar

description: Porkchop Hill is a wargame taking place on the Pacific island of Iwo Jima on February 16, 1945. One player takes on the role of the Americans and the other as the Japanese in the battle for Mount Suribachi. The game is based on an existing tabletop wargame.
title: Porkchop Hill

description: Middle Earth is a futuristic wargame taking place inside planet Earth. In the future (now past) year of 1997 the United Nations have found tunnels to the Earth's core. In this land of flames they must fight unknown creatures. The game is based on an existing tabletop wargame.
title: Middle Earth

description: The Battle of Monmouth is a wargame for two players. Players take the role of Lee and Washington and reenact the 1778 battle during the American Revolution.
title: The Battle of Monmouth

description: Waterloo is a wargame taking place during the Napoleonic wars. One player controls Napoleon's French forces, the other player takes control of the Anglo-Dutch alliance and Prussians in the decisive battle. The game is based on an existing tabletop wargame.
title: Waterloo

description: D-Day is a World War II wargame in which the Allied landings in France and the resulting drive to the Rhine are reenacted. One player plays the German occupiers and the other plays the allied forces.
title: D-Day

description: Afrika Korps is a wargame in which two players fight each other in Northern Africa. The setting is World War II and one player takes the role of the Allied forces and the other the German forces.
title: Afrika Korps
